channel.title: ___ - XN [Dubstep] [Possible album/EP] [feedback]
channel.description:
Well 2 things. First, i have a new track ive been working on. Much 2012 dubstep lol. Feedback is always appreciated https://soundcloud.com/xn-extras/ugly-shrimp-wip-straight-outta/s-k8tU1
Second, i'm thinking about putting together an album/EP with a couple of other alike tracks (including the one above) i've been working on or have backlogged and never finished (which i obviously would for the EP). I would also combine some tracks from Auxy as well as some i've been working on in Garageband. When it will be released is anyone's guess lol.
Auxy track (Obsidia inspired...kinda): https://soundcloud.com/xn-extras/stupid-gecko-obsidia/s-cRxza
Garageband tracks: (only 1/2 done. still need a 2nd drop) https://soundcloud.com/xn-extras/screamland-wip/s-Raebl
(still need to work on drop. it's a bit repetitive) https://soundcloud.com/m_x_c_n/munstas-wip-or-something-1/s-p07MH
Again, feedback is always appreciated

item.title: ___ - XN [Dubstep] [Possible album/EP] [feedback]
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
Ugly Shrimp had some great ideas. The triplet time drumming peppered in there is something I should be doing more often but don’t. I really like this I think it just needs to have some other sounds or automation in there. I didn’t notice anything bad about bee but sometimes I’m so bad at identifying the drop so maybe I just missed it lol.

Nice to hear dubstep coming out of GarageBand, they’ve added quite a bit in recent updates that made it more possible along with other genres. It’s a good tool overall.

I think overall these ideas are really good just need more polish. I do think they’d all sit very nicely in an EP together from what I’m hearing. Looking forward to more

Read full topic

item.title: ___ - XN [Dubstep] [Possible album/EP] [feedback]
item.dc:creator: El1011
item.description:
Lol. That moment when u like the first drop better than the second.

But yeah I can see what u mean. It is lacking a bit of punch to it. Maybe I’ll fiddle around with some different instruments and see what I can get

item.title: ___ - XN [Dubstep] [Possible album/EP] [feedback]
item.dc:creator: Indigoo
item.description:
The first part of the drop in ugly shrimp is just… bee does not work with it. It ends of just sounding weird and not really like a drop. 2nd part is pretty good though.

Read full topic
